snippet: Ricardo Steak House, in East Harlem, is an unapologetic party spot, attracting people of all walks, races and ages.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Ricardo Steak House, unapologetic party spot in East Harlem that attracts diverse clientele.
lead_paragraph: Ricardo Steak House, in East Harlem, is an unapologetic party spot, attracting people of all walks, races and ages.

headline.print_headline: They’re Gonna Party Like It’s Your Birthday
headline.main: At Ricardo Steak House, They’re Gonna Party Like It’s Your Birthday
